QuestData.Title: The Farseer Awaits
QuestData.Description: Your presence has been requested at the Throne of Elements, $n.$b$bFarseer Drek'Thar heard the call of the furies upon the wind and made the journey to commune with the elements.$b$bThe Farseer has sent word that you are to join him at the Throne of Elements.$b$bGo and see what the elements would have of you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Farseer Drek'Thar at the Throne of Elements.
QuestData.RewardText: Throm-Ka, $n. All is not right in Nagrand, it is good that you are here.
